Este es el [repositorio](https://github.com/GSMir/Entrega3), y el data set lo hemos sacado de este [link](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/dataset/162/forest+fires)

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


```{r}
library(readr)
forestfire <- read.csv("https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/forest-fires/forestfires.csv")
```


Hay `r nrow(forestfire)` visualizaciones de `r ncol(forestfire)` variables.
